nd: current time step for low cadence data
nd_tau: current time step for high cadence data
xdcheck: if 1: x direction is solved, otherwise 0
ydcheck: if 1: y direction is solved, otherwise 0
zdcheck: if 1: z direction is solved, otherwise 0
nx: no. of grid points in x direction in a MPI process
ny: no. of grid points in y direction in a MPI process
nz: no. of grid points in z direction in a MPI process
npe: no. of MPI processes, npe = ix0*jx0*kx0
ix0: no. of MPI processes in x direction
jx0: no. of MPI processes in y direction
kx0: no. of MPI processes in z direction
dtout: time interval for low cadence output
ix_e: no. of grid point in ro of table EoS
jx_e: no. of grid point in te of table EoS
ixr: number of MPI process in x direction in remap coordinate
jxr: number of MPI process in y direction in remap coordinate
m_in: no. of variable kinds for intensity variables
dtout_tau: time interval for high cadence output
ifac: factor for output between low and high cadence. dtout = ifac*dtout_tau
omfac: ratio of system rotation rate to the solar rotation rate
jc: slice number in y direction for remap_calc
kc: slice number in z direction for remap_calc
potential_alpha: Alpha factor for top boundary, see Rempel, 2012
ix_ununi: no. of uniform grid points in x direction
dx00: grid spacing in uniform grid area in x direction
endian: endianness of the data for Python
xyz: MPI rank in x, y, z direction
ix: no. of grid points in x direction
jx: no. of grid points in y direction
kx: no. of grid points in z direction
ixg: no. of grid points in x direction with margin
jxg: no. of grid points in y direction with margin
kxg: no. of grid points in z direction with margin
x_flux: x grid for flux calculation, i.e., mid point of x grid
jx_yy: no. of grid points in latitude direction for each Yin Yang grid
kx_yy: no. of grid points in longitude direction for each Yin Yang grid
jxg_yy: no. of grid points in latitude direction for each Yin Yang grid with margin
kxg_yy: no. of grid points in longitude direction for each Yin Yang grid with margin
y_yy: y grid for each Yin Yang grid
z_yy: z grid for each Yin Yang grid
yg_yy: y grid for each Yin Yang grid with margin
zg_yy: z grid for each Yin Yang grid with margin
m2d_xy: no. of variables for xy OnTheFly
m2d_xz: no. of variables for xz OnTheFly
m2d_flux: no. of variables for flux OnTheFly
m2d_spex: no. of variables for spectrum OnTheFly
iss: start index for x direction for each MPI process in remap
iee: end index for x direction for each MPI process in remap
jss: start index for y direction for each MPI process in remap
jee: end index for y direction for each MPI process in remap
iixl: no. of grid points in x direction for each MPI process in remap
jjxl: no. of grid points in y direction for each MPI process in remap
np_ijr: MPI rank in x, y direction in remap
ir: MPI process index in x direction in remap
jr: MPI process index in y direction in remap
nx_slice: no. of slices in x direction
ny_slice: no. of slices in y direction
nz_slice: no. of slices in z direction
dlogro_e: grid space in log(ro) in table EoS
dse_e: grid space in se in table EoS
